commit message: Initial commit
Added Eclipse-generated template.
Added Android manifest file and updated README.
Cleaned up the code a bit in preparation for implementing the API methods.
Implemented parts of APIRequest class.
Added resource files.
Added the rest of the Eclipse/ADT required files.
Added layout for list item and started creating ArticleAdapter class.
Implemented display of article list, although it is completely non-functional.
Created separate class for articles and authors.
Implemented the loading and display of articles.
Fixed scrolling bug in WebView.
Added cache and unimplemented refresh button.
Began adding new database backend.
Began adding the broadcast receiver and service that will poll the API.
Completed the service code that enumerates the articles obtained although they are not yet processed.
Finished implementing UpdateService.
Added notifications for new articles and new article icon.
Removed the outdated API request package and added a synchronous API request implementation to the update service.
Added content provider for retrieving article data.
Added enough code to get the update service running and some data retrieved from the API.
Implemented the insert() method of the article content provider.
Made a few more tweaks to the content provider.
Implemented bulk insert.
Implemented enough stuff to get a working release capable of displaying recent articles.
